spell.light.name: Light
spell.light.description:
Summons a small [key.flavour.important](light) to illuminate your surroundings.
[key.flavour.secret](Light is a curious thing - without it, we are blind. With too much, we are blind also.)
spell.fire_bolt.name: Fire Bolt
spell.fire_bolt.description: Shoot a bolt of [key.flag.fire](flame) that deals [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.flag.fire] [key.mechanic.damage] on a direct hit, and explodes in a small [key.mechanic.area_of_effect] for an additional [key.variable.static](50%) [key.mechanic.damage].
spell.flaming_hands.name: Palm of Fire
spell.flaming_hands.description: Continuously shoot a gout of [key.flag.fire](flame) that deals [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.flag.fire] [key.mechanic.damage] per second.
spell.magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
spell.magic_missile.description:
Quickly send out [key.variable.positive]({0}) missiles of [key.flag.arcane] force that each deal [key.variable.positive]({1}) [key.flag.arcane] [key.mechanic.damage].
These missiles will aggressively [key.mechanic.homing](Home) in on valid targets.
spell.blur.name: Blur
spell.blur.description:
The silohuette of your body becomes fuzzy as your physical form becomes less distinct.
Enemy attacks and spells have a [key.variable.positive]({0:P0}) chance to [key.flavour.important](miss) you entirely.
spell.shield.name: Shield
spell.shield.description:
Summons [key.variable.positive]({0}) magical shield(s) of [key.flag.arcane](Arcane Force) to protect you.
The shields will [key.flavour.important](autonomously) [key.flavour.important](intercept) attacks and [key.mechanic.parry] them for you.
Each shield can withstand [key.variable.positive]({1}) attacks before [key.flavour.negative](breaking), and will automatically reform after [key.variable.positive]({2}) seconds while the spell is [key.mechanic.sustaining](Sustained).
